name: UIGraphicsImageRendererFormat.Range
desc: Constants that specify the color range of the image renderer context.

items.name: case automatic
items.desc: The system automatically chooses the image renderer context’s pixel format according to the color range of its content.

items.name: case extended
items.desc: The image renderer context supports wide color.

items.name: case standard
items.desc: The image renderer context doesn’t support extended colors.

items.name: case unspecified
items.desc: The image renderer context doesn’t specify a color range.
